title: Can't find Item Sets in profile
body: I don't know if it hasn't been added yet or if it is removed of the alpha client but I can't seem to find the item sets tab in my profile. Would be nice to add that so it makes mine and other Summoners battle experiences a little more easier.

replies.body: It's on the normal Client but not on the Alpha so I think it should be added and it makes my game experience slightly more easier and enjoyable.

I remember this was talking about a few weeks to a month ago saying they will not include Item Sets since there isn't a majority of people that use it. However! They will allow third party items set providers to give you the ability to make item sets and use them in-game.
